original: /srog bdud nag po'i dbang bsdus pa
analyzed: /srog bdud nag po'i dbang bsdus pa
translated: The Black Life-Force Māra’s Empowerment

original: rin po che rgyas pa zhes bya ba/
analyzed: rin po che rgyas pa zhes bya ba/
translated: The Precious Expanse

original: / @/_mgon po :kyi dbang bzhugs so//_@##/_/dpal khrag 'thung rgyal🔽po la phyag 'tshhal lo/_/nag po chen po'i dbang bsdus pa'i lag len byed par

translated: should sweep out the house well, set out the five offerings, and arrange the tormas. The first is for the pledged deity and the wisdom being of Mahākāla; the second is for the glorious life-force Māra and his retinue; the third is for the general Dharma protectors; the fourth is a white torma.

original: bdud 'khor bcas la/_gsum pa chos skyong spyi la/_bzhi pa dkar gtor cig_/
analyzed: bdud 'khor bcas la/_gsum pa chos skyong spyi la/_bzhi pa dkar gtor cig_/
translated: Offer the first to the pledged deity and the wisdom being of Mahākāla; the second to the glorious life-force Māra and his retinue; the third to the general Dharma protectors; the fourth to the six types of beings who dwell in the three abodes.

original: rigs drug na gnas pa rnams la bsngo/_ka pa la gcig tu chang la bdud rtshi/_a
analyzed: rigs drug na gnas pa rnams la bsngo/_ka pa la gcig tu chang la bdud rtshi/_a

analyzed: rdzas bsham pa'o/_/ de nas rang yi dam du gsal ba'i thugs ka nas sa bon las 'od 'phros/

analyzed: dpal nag po chen po yab yum lha mo brgyad kyis bskor ba spyan drangs te/_mgon
translated: Glorious Mahākāla, the father and mother surrounded by eight goddesses, are invited.

original: srog bdud nag po'i dbang bsdus pa rin po che rgyas pa zhes bya ba
analyzed: srog bdud nag po'i dbang bsdus pa rin po che rgyas pa zhes bya ba
translated: The Condensed Empowerment of the Protector, the Life-Force of the Black Lord, Called “The Precious Expanse”

original: po'i shar du pu tra mo/_lhor ka ri ma/_nub du re'u tri ma/_byang du las byed ma/
analyzed: po'i shar du pu tra mo/_lhor ka ri ma/_nub du re'u tri ma/_byang du las byed ma/

analyzed: nub byang rtsha u tri/_byang shar pe ta li'o/_/sprul pa mon pho bdun/_mon mo bdun/ yang sprul khyi mo drug_/lho phyogs gshin rje brgyad/_byang gnod sbyin brgyad/_bdud
translated: in the northwest, Rātri; in the northeast, Petailā; the seven emanations, the seven Mön women;🔽the seven emanations, the seven Mön men; the seven emanations, the seven Mön women; the seven emanations, the seven Mön children; the seven emanations, the seven Mön dogs; the seven emanations, the seven Mön birds; and the seven emanations, the seven Mön horses.

translated: In the south are the eight Yama; in the north, the eight yakṣa; and the eight māra and rākṣasa, and so on, each with their own color, upon seats of lotus, sun, and corpse, rākṣasa, bhūta, and vetāla, with legs crossed or drawn up, dancing,

analyzed: gyi tshhul du bskyed/_mchod gtor phul la mnyes par bsam/_de nas bdag gi

analyzed: slob ma 'di rnams la mgon pos dbang bskur du gsol/_zhes gsol ba lan

analyzed: gsum gdab/_de nas rigs drug dang /_gnyug mar gnas pa'i gtor ma 'byung

analyzed: gtor bzhin dbul/_yi dam dang ye shes pa la gtor ma dbul/_nag po chen po

analyzed: srog bdud 'khor bcas la/_'di rang gi byin rlabs rgyas bsdus gang rung gis

analyzed: phul/_bstod bskul bya/_'phrin las gzhol lo/_/mgon po po gtor ma dbang

analyzed: gi don du bzhag_/chos skyong spyi'i gtor ma btang /_yig brgya grub tshhad gcig
translated: Offer the general torma to the Dharma protectors and recite the hundred-syllable mantra once.

original: bzlas/_de nas slob dpon gyis yi dam gyi snying po dang /_om ma ha ka la hu~m phat/
analyzed: bzlas/_de nas slob dpon gyis yi dam gyi snying po dang /_om ma ha ka la hu~m phat/
translated: Then, the master recites the essence mantra of the yidam and “Oṃ mahākāla hūṃ phaṭ /

analyzed: om sarba bud d+ha d+ha kri ni sha ri hum dzahces pa stong phrag gcig bzlas so/_/

analyzed: de nas slob mas bla ma la phyag dang yon dang man+dal phul la gsol ba gdab
translated: Then the disciple makes prostrations to the guru, offers a maṇḍala and gifts, and makes supplications:🔽“Lord, assembly of vajra holders,🔽in order to completely purify

analyzed: pa ni/_rje btshun rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtsho/_/bdag gi lus ngag yid gsum gyi/_/

analyzed: dri ma ma lus dag bya'i phyir/_/ma smin smin pa'i dbang rnams brtshol/_/zhes
translated: I seek the empowerments that ripen the unripened.”🔽The guru gives permission:

analyzed: gsol ba lan gsum gdab bla mas gnang ba bya ste/_nga ni sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo

analyzed: bo yin/_/nga ni khrag thung kun gyi rje/_/nga ni rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gtsho/_/khyed

analyzed: la nga'i mthu sbyin zhing /_/byin gyis brlab cing dbang bskur ro/_/ces ngas

analyzed: dbang sbyin gyis bsgrubs cig gsung bar bsam mo/_/de nas skyabs 'gro sems
translated: Think that the guru says, “I will give you the empowerment, so practice.”🔽Then, the going for refuge and arousing the mind of awakening are given:

analyzed: bskyed dbog ste/_sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ste/_/bla med dkon
translated: “The Buddha, Dharma, and Saṅgha,🔽the unsurpassed Three Jewels,🔽the assembly of gurus, yidams, and buddhas,

analyzed: mchog gsum po dang /_/bla ma yi dam lha tshhogs dang /_/bde gshegs rnams

analyzed: la skyabs su mchi/_/ces lan gsum brjod do/_/de nas/_ji ltar dus
translated: Repeat this three times.🔽Then:🔽

analyzed: gsum mgon po rnams/_/byang chub du ni nges mdzad cing /_/byang chub sems

analyzed: ni bla med pa/_/dam pa bdag gis sems bskyed do/_/tshhad med pa bzhi'i

analyzed: don sgom/_de nas thod pa bdud rtshi dang bcas pa slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la/

analyzed: dpon slob gnyis kas mdun gyi nam mkha' la/_srog bdud yab yum la lha mo

analyzed: bdun dang /_sprul pa mon mo bdun/_yang sprul khyi mo drug_/sbas pa'i
translated: the seven emanated demonesses, the six emanated bitches, and the hidden retinue.

analyzed: 'khor gyis bskor bar bsams la gsol ba gsum gdab/_'di skad brjod/

analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas spyan lam du/_/mos gus dad pas 'dud pa la/_/sku'i
translated: In the presence of the buddhas of the three times, I bow down with devoted admiration and faith.🔽The nature of the body

original: rang bzhin byin par byed/_/'gyur med nag pos dbang bskur zhing /_/
analyzed: rang bzhin byin par byed/_/'gyur med nag pos dbang bskur zhing /_/
translated: bestows blessings, and the unchanging black one confers empowerment.🔽The garment of the lion skin, which is like poison,

original: ngar 'joms byed pa dug 'dra ba'i/_/zil gnon seng ge lpags pa'i gos/_/
analyzed: ngar 'joms byed pa dug 'dra ba'i/_/zil gnon seng ge lpags pa'i gos/_/
translated: overpowers the arrogant ones.

analyzed: mi 'gyur g.yung drung mun pa'i gos/_/gsod byed drag po dbang gi gos/_/
translated: the garment of the protector,🔽is conferred.

analyzed: mgon po'i gos kyis dbang bskur ro/_/ces mgo thog du bzhag_/yang gong
translated: Place it on the head.🔽Again, repeat the above supplication three times.

original: gi gsol ba lan gsum gdab/_gsung gi dbang bzhi ngag la bskur ro/_/🔽gzhad pa ha ha gad mo'i dbang /_/khros pa dza la phat kyi dbang /_/zhi mdzad
analyzed: gi gsol ba lan gsum gdab/_gsung gi dbang bzhi ngag la bskur ro/_/ gzhad pa ha ha gad mo'i dbang /_/khros pa dza la phat kyi dbang /_/zhi mdzad
translated: The four empowerments of speech are conferred on the voice.🔽The empowerment of the laughter ha ha ha,🔽the empowerment of the wrathful ja la ja la,🔽the empowerment of the peaceful svā hā,

original: swa ha sbyor ba'i dbang /_/bsdud pa hum mdzad pho gi dbang /_bshugs pa'i
analyzed: swa ha sbyor ba'i dbang /_/bsdud pa hum mdzad pho gi dbang /_bshugs pa'i
translated: the empowerment of the gathering huṃ,🔽the empowerment of the wailing bho bho,🔽the empowerment of the four Tibetan revilers,

original: bod pa b+han+d+ha'i dbang /_/bod rbad rnam bzhis dbang bskur ro/_/yang lan
analyzed: bod pa b+han+d+ha'i dbang /_/bod rbad rnam bzhis dbang bskur ro/_/yang lan
translated: is conferred.🔽Again, repeat the above supplication three times.

analyzed: gsum gdab/_thugs kyi dbang bzhi sems la bskur/_/nyon mongs zil
translated: The four empowerments of mind are conferred on the mind.🔽The empowerment of the selflessness that overwhelms afflictions,

analyzed: gnon bdag med dbang /_/sdug bsngal gdung 'dren snying rje'i dbang /_/
translated: the empowerment of compassion that leads out of suffering,🔽the empowerment of the nondual union of Nārāyaṇa,

analyzed: sred med sbyor ba gnyis med dbang /_/'bras bu rang chas 'gro don dbang /_/
translated: the empowerment of the benefit of migrating beings that is the naturally existing result,🔽is conferred.

original: srog bdud nag po'i dbang bsdus pa rin po che rgyas pa zhes bya ba
analyzed: srog bdud nag po'i dbang bsdus pa rin po che rgyas pa zhes bya ba
translated: The Concise Empowerment of the Black Life-Force Demon, the Precious Extensive One

original: 'gro don dgongs pa'i dbang bskur ro/_/yon tan 'phrin las nges pa'i dbang🔽bskur sbyin/_/rang don longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yon tan gter/_/gzhan
analyzed: 'gro don dgongs pa'i dbang bskur ro/_/yon tan 'phrin las nges pa'i dbang bskur sbyin/_/rang don longs spyod rdzogs pa'i yon tan gter/_/gzhan
translated: The empowerment of the definite qualities and activity is conferred.🔽The treasure of the qualities of the enjoyment body for one’s own benefit🔽and the treasure of the qualities that fulfill the needs and desires of others

original: don dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i yon tan gter/_/'bras bu 'phrin las nges par🔽dbang bskur ro/_/zhi mdzad zhi ba'i 'phrin las dang /_/rgyas mdzad rgyas pa'i🔽'phrin las dang /_/dbang sdud dbang gi 'phrin las dang /_/mngon spyod drag
analyzed: don dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i yon tan gter/_/'bras bu 'phrin las nges par dbang bskur ro/_/zhi mdzad zhi ba'i 'phrin las dang /_/rgyas mdzad rgyas pa'i 'phrin las dang /_/dbang sdud dbang gi 'phrin las dang /_/mngon spyod drag
translated: for the benefit of others—the empowerment of the definite activity of the result🔽is conferred.🔽The empowerment of the four activities is conferred: the activity of peace🔽that accomplishes peace, the activity of increase that accomplishes increase,

original: po'i 'phrin las bzhi/_/las bzhi mdzad pa'i dbang bskur ro/_/zhes brjod
analyzed: po'i 'phrin las bzhi/_/las bzhi mdzad pa'i dbang bskur ro/_/zhes brjod
translated: the activity of power that accomplishes power, and the activity of fierce🔽wrath that accomplishes wrath.

original: pas/_rang yi dam lha dang nag po chen po'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas/🔽rang bzhin gyi gnas nas nag po 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/_bar snang gi
analyzed: pas/_rang yi dam lha dang nag po chen po'i thugs ka nas 'od 'phros pas/ rang bzhin gyi gnas nas nag po 'khor bcas spyan drangs te/_bar snang gi
translated: As this is said, light shines from the heart of the pledged deity and Mahākāla.🔽From the natural abode, Mahākāla and retinue are invited and dissolve into the pledge beings in the space above.

original: dam tshhig pa la bstim la/_dpal nag po chen po 'khor bcas kyi phyag na/
analyzed: dam tshhig pa la bstim la/_dpal nag po chen po 'khor bcas kyi phyag na/
translated: In the hands of Śrī Mahākāla and retinue,

original: rin po che'i bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtshis gang ba thogs te/_slob ma'i spyi bo
analyzed: rin po che'i bum pa ye shes kyi bdud rtshis gang ba thogs te/_slob ma'i spyi bo
translated: The master holds a precious vase filled with the elixir of timeless awareness and confers the empowerment upon the disciples’ heads.

original: nas dbang bskur te/_smin mtshhams yan gang bas bum pa'i dbang thob/🔽lus kyi dri ma dag par bsam/_mgrin pa yan chad gang bas gsang ba'i dbang
analyzed: nas dbang bskur te/_smin mtshhams yan gang bas bum pa'i dbang thob/ lus kyi dri ma dag par bsam/_mgrin pa yan chad gang bas gsang ba'i dbang
translated: The elixir fills up to the point between the eyebrows, and they receive the vase empowerment.🔽Imagine that it purifies physical stains.🔽The elixir fills up to the throat, and they receive the secret empowerment.🔽Imagine that it purifies verbal stains.

original: thob/_ngag gi dri ma dag_/snying ga yan chad gang bas shes rab ye shes kyi
analyzed: thob/_ngag gi dri ma dag_/snying ga yan chad gang bas shes rab ye shes kyi
translated: The elixir fills up to the heart, and they receive the wisdom-awareness empowerment.🔽Imagine that it purifies mental stains.

original: dbang thob/_sems kyi dri ma dag_/lte ba nas gsang gnas yan chad gang bas
analyzed: dbang thob/_sems kyi dri ma dag_/lte ba nas gsang gnas yan chad gang bas
translated: The elixir fills up from the navel to the secret place,

original: dbang bzhi pa thob/_lus ngag yid gsum tha dad du 'dzin pa'i dri ma dag_/
analyzed: dbang bzhi pa thob/_lus ngag yid gsum tha dad du 'dzin pa'i dri ma dag_/
translated: and they receive the fourth empowerment. Imagine that it purifies the stains of clinging to the separateness of body, voice, and mind.

original: sku gsum gyi don thob par gnyis kas bsam mo/_/dngos su slob dpon gyis
analyzed: sku gsum gyi don thob par gnyis kas bsam mo/_/dngos su slob dpon gyis
translated: Both master and disciples imagine that they have attained the meaning of the three kāyas.

original: sngar gyi thod pa'i bdud rtshi de mgo thog tu blugs te khrus byas 'thung du bcug pas/
analyzed: sngar gyi thod pa'i bdud rtshi de mgo thog tu blugs te khrus byas 'thung du bcug pas/
translated: In actuality, the master pours the previously mentioned skull cup of elixir on their heads and has them wash and drink it.

original: lus sems thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyis gang bar bsam zhing /_sngags
analyzed: lus sems thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyis gang bar bsam zhing /_sngags
translated: Imagine that the mind and body are filled with bodhicitta.🔽Recite the mantra and play the ḍamaru and bell.

original: drag tu bzlas te/_sarba ta tha ga ta dz+nya na badzra sarba badzra badzra phat/_a b+hi shiny+tsha mam
analyzed: drag tu bzlas te/_sarba ta tha ga ta dz+nya na badzra sarba badzra badzra phat/_a b+hi shiny+tsha mam
translated: Sarva tathāgata jñāna vajra sarva vajra phat🔽Abhiṣiñcantu mam🔽Hum🔽Om āḥ hum hum tram hrīḥ svāhā

analyzed: hu~m/_om ahhum hu~m tram hrih_swa ha/_sarba ta tha ga ta dz+nya na badzra sarba bud+d+ha badzra phat/
translated: Sarva tathāgata jñāna vajra sarva buddha vajra phat🔽Abhiṣiñcantu mam hum🔽Om āḥ hum hum tram hrīḥ svāhā

analyzed: a b+hi shiny+tsha mam hum/_om ah_hu~mhum tram hri swa ha/_om sarba ta tha ga ta dz+nya na badzra sarba rang
translated: Om sarva tathāgata jñāna vajra sarva ratna vajra phat🔽Abhiṣiñcantu mam hum🔽Om āḥ hum hum tram hrīḥ svāhā

analyzed: badzra phat/_a b+hi shiny+tsha mam hum/_om ahhum hu~m tram hrih_swa ha/_om sarba ta tha ga ta dz+nya na

original: badzra sarba pad+ma badzra phat a b+hi shiny+tsha mam hum/_om ah_hum tram hrih_swa ha/_om sarba ta tha
analyzed: badzra sarba pad+ma badzra phat a b+hi shiny+tsha mam hum/_om ah_hum tram hrih_swa ha/_om sarba ta tha
translated: Om sarva tathāgata jñāna vajra sarva karma vajra phat🔽Abhiṣiñcantu mam hum

original: ga ta dz+nya na badzra sarba karma badzra phat/_a b+hi shiny+tsha mam hum/_om ahhum hu~m tram hrih_swa ha/
